Mystery of the seventh layer
05 Nov 2019, 20:30 by onlooker



The secret of the 7th row - visually explained In 1995 I published an article in the Mathematical Intelligencer. This article was about giving the ultimate visual explanations for a number of stunning circle ... www.youtube.com
Not all geometry is made by Euclid. Here is a striking simple and beautiful find of modern times (Charles Payan 1989). Every seventh layer of circles is exactly horizontal! The video notes provide links to original publications.
